A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie would be good if it wasn't a Star Wars movie. There are a lot of small things that hurt this film but\, as a Star Wars fan\, I was willing to forgive them if Rian Johnson gave me what I wanted. Having the real Luke Skywalker in a film rather than a whiny curmudgeon would've forgiven everything. Instead he has now selfishly removed a quintessential character in a way that does him no injustice.
